definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_logic_getgamerule"><field name="gamerulesboolean">CUSTOM:DoomsdayToggle</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="4"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"While the chances are slim but not zero, it is unlikely the world will end anytime soon.","bold":true,"color":"gold"}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Risk</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"There is a reasonable chance the world could see its end fairly soon.","bold":true,"color":"gold"}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation name="NUM">3</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"The world is due to end any day now.","bold":true,"color":"gold"}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF3"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Risk</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO3"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"The chances of the world ending as astronomically name="VAR">global:Risk</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO4"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"The chances of the world ending are right around the
